name: kafaildalf
description:
made for metroidvania month 8

A mysterious client asks for your team to search the remote jungle in the centre of 'kafaildalf'. 

theres a lot of bad spelling and grammar that needs to be fixed, aswell as some other things but there shouln't be anything major

controls are explained in game but here they are anyway:

keyboard:

arrows=move

Z=jump

X=attack

space=ice beam

R=respawn

controller:

dpad=move

A=jump

X=attack

Left trigger=respawn

right trigger=ice beam

start=select/move dialogue
